messageBody:
I have a question
Can anyone help me out???

I have to compile my EJB which drive many classes.

Is their any automate tool which supports when you compile your EJB class it has to compile its dependent classes automattically.I have to do this on UNIT
platform.


Please answer my questions asap

Thanks
Alagu
